amendment.description: Amendment increases funding for Immigration Customs and Enforcement by $1 million offset by reducing funds for Homeland Security Department Executive Management by a similar amount.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in the Congressional Record to increase funding for Immigration Customs and Enforcement by $1 million. The increase would be offset by reducing funds for Homeland Security Department executive management.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Royce amendment (A003) Agreed to by recorded vote: 268 - 151 (Roll no. 386).
